-- | This module provides versions of functions from
--   <a>System.Posix.Files</a> that operate on <a>Handle</a> instead of

--   conditions that may arise from looking up the same path twice.
module System.Posix.Handle

-- | <tt>hSetMode h mode</tt> acts like <a>setFileMode</a> or
--   <a>setFdMode</a> on a <a>Handle</a>.

--   Note: calls <tt>fchmod</tt>.

-- | <tt>hGetStatus h</tt> acts like <a>getFileStatus</a> or
--   <a>getFdStatus</a> on a <a>Handle</a>.
--   
--   Note: calls <tt>fstat</tt>.
